body_html: Hard to say. There is no best method of regularization. Since the intention of weight decay (usually L2 regularization) is to keep the L2 norm of weights small to shrink the hypothesis space, I'd suggest that the biases be decayed.

body: Hard to say. There is no best method of regularization. Since the intention of weight decay (usually L2 regularization) is to keep the L2 norm of weights small to shrink the hypothesis space, I'd suggest that the biases be decayed.
